alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 08 at 9:00AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CHST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Southern Guam. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 859 AM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Radar estimates of 1 to 3 inches of rain have fallen across southern Guam. - Some locations that could experience flooding include... Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Talofofo, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
